Manuscript Submission

How to Submit

Please send your manuscript materials to our email:

📧 oukawk@yahoo.co.jp

Submission Guidelines

  • • We welcome academic works in modern and contemporary Chinese political thought, legal studies, constitutional economics, and social culture
  • • Submitted works should be original and unpublished by other publishers
  • • Please provide a complete manuscript or detailed writing plan
  • • We will respond within 30 business days after receiving your submission

Required Materials

  1. 1. Author's biography (including academic background, research fields, major achievements)
  2. 2. Work synopsis (within 3000 words)
  3. 3. Table of contents
  4. 4. Sample chapters (2-3 chapters)
  5. 5. Expected completion date (if unfinished)

Contact Us

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us:

Email: oukawk@yahoo.co.jp
